name: Candy Blast Mania: Candy Link
description:
Candy Blast Mania Candy Link Game 2016 is the top Match-3 game. This game is a smash hit with satisfying and juicy shining Candy Blast Mania Candy Link.
This game with a lot of special power-ups and awesome visual effects, you can expect the ultimate in Candy Blast Mania Candy Link collecting and explosive fun!

By playing this game you may find yourself hopelessly addicted to swapping the glorious Candy Blast Mania Candy Link. It is a simple but extremely fun match-3 game.
Candy Blast Mania Candy Link Game 2016 is a very addictive connect lines puzzle game!
Connect colorful lines of candy to solve compelling levels in this puzzle adventure!
Clear three or more same candy to score points, try to use game props to make more combos!

Candy Blast Mania Candy Link Game 2016 Features:
- Colorful and vivid candy
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- Reward players with many achievements.
- Exciting and delicious candy trip.
- More than 60 puzzle levels & many game props.

Candy Blast Mania Candy Link Game 2016 How to play:
1. Connect three or more same candy to score points.
2. Archive the target points to level up.
3. Eliminate the more candy quickly can get extra scores.
So join it, match 3 or more candy in this puzzle of lines!

Thank for play Candy Blast Mania Candy Game 2016
